          <title>
            <string language="en">Weight of solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht der Lösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poids de solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peso da solução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Peso della soluzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάρος της λύσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peso de la solución</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the weight of a solution is sum of the weight of the solute and solvent.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solvent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das Gewicht einer 
Lösung Summe des Gewichts des aufgelösten Stoffs und des 
Lösungsmittels ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le poids d'une 
solution est somme du poids du corps dissous et du dissolvant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o peso de uma 
solução é soma do peso do solute e do solvente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il peso di una 
soluzione è somma del peso del soluto e del solvente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το βάρος μιας λύσης 
είναι ποσό του βάρους της διαλυτής ουσίας και του διαλύτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el peso de una 
solución es suma del peso del solute y del solvente.</string>
          </description>
